name: Glass Golem
languages: Understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
resist: piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The glass golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Shard
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Shatter
text: When a glass golem takes bludgeoning damage, it can make one shard attack against each creature within 5 feet of it.
